testcase.name: Enter Username and Password
testcase.system-out: Given I want to go on Uplers................................................passed When I verify the Email id and Password are displayed.......................passed Then I enter the Email id and Password......................................passed And I click on Login Button.................................................passed And I verify HomePage Header Text...........................................passed And I click on Profile Link.................................................passed And I verify "Personal Details" section.....................................passed And I click on Personal Details link........................................passed
